CustomField.formula: IF(RecordType.Name = "Capital Provider", "External", IF(RecordType.Name = "Conflicts Check LDCCR", "Internal", IF(RecordType.Name = "Houlihan Company", "Internal", IF(RecordType.Name = "Legal Entity", "Internal", IF(RecordType.Name = "Operating Company", "External", NULL)))))
CustomField.label: ERP Customer Type Description
